name: Don't End a Word
shortDescription: A strategic word-building game where players take turns adding letters without completing a word. Challenge the computer or friends in this clever word duel.
fullDescription:
Don't End a Word is a captivating word game where the challenge is to avoid completing a valid English word. Players take turns adding a single letter to either the front or back of a central word fragment. The player who completes a valid word loses the round.

Key Features:

  • Multiple Game Modes: Play VS Computer (with adjustable difficulty), challenge a VS Random online opponent, or start a match with a VS Friend.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Plan your moves carefully to avoid completing a word while making it possible for your opponent to lose.
  • Challenge System: Use the CHALLENGE button if you believe the word fragment is complete or impossible to extend. The game verifies the word and definition to determine the winner.
  • Hints: Get a helping hand with the Hint feature when stuck.
  • Flexible Login: Sign in securely with Email or Mobile, or jump straight into the game with Play as Guest.

Test your word skills, outsmart your opponents, and enjoy endless rounds of clever wordplay!
